oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup - 1947-01-16 - KOMA - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part one of a performance from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on January 16, 1947 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chuck Davis; Roundup Boys; Oklahoma Songbirds; Ann Bond; Lem Hawkins; Little Willie; Jack Beasley; Mary Lou
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (0:26) Opening theme and statements / (1:40) Hiram Higsby tells a joke / (1:52) Chuck Davis and the Roundup Boys perform "Under The Yum Yum Tree" / (3:22) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (4:00) The Oklahoma Songbirds perform "I’ll Go Riding Down That Texas Trail" / (5:44) Hiram Higsby and Ann Bond tell a joke / (6:00) Ann Bon performs "Never Let Those Deep Blues Get You Down" [unconfirmed] / (8:27) Lem Hawkins and Hiram Higsby tell a joke / (8:48) Lem Hawkins, Chuck Davis, Little Willie, and Jack Beasley perform "My Little Lady" / (10:40) Mary Lou performs "Little Old Rag Doll" / (12:57) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (13:24) Chuck Davis performs interlude theme / (14:14) Allan Page announces the show’s credits [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); CBS Inc.; Davis, Chuck; Bond, Ann; Beasley, Jack; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975;
